stimulusHtml: The image could best be understood within the context of which of the following developments?

features.html: B-24 LIBERATOR BOMBERS NEARING COMPLETION AT THE CONSOLIDATED AIRCRAFT CORPORATION PLANT, FORT WORTH, TEXAS, 1942

choicesHtml: The reluctance of the two Cold War superpowers to engage in direct military conflict with each other
The shift in the global balance of power associated with the Second World War
The increasing importance of unconventional methods of warfare as global conflict intensified
The greater technical skills of individual workers necessitated by wartime production
